name: Typethink
tagline: We Create Profitable Experiences For You
description: Typethink is a seasoned creative firm providing exceptional website design, custom application development, web marketing, and consulting services. Typethink also offers a full range of brand conscious design services for business identity, collateral material, and video/media production. Having worked with organizations of all sizes, ranging from local businesses to national corporations and government agencies, Typethink understands the unique needs of every client.
